1445160.name: Luminous Plume Original Soundtrack
1445160.description:
Luminous Plume's Original Soundtrack features 34 tracks and over 100 minutes of symphonic and rock music alike, traversing a multitude of video game inspirations in the process.

Listen closely as Aoki Katsumata's catchy melodies, soothing harmonies, and more fuse together in an evocative, highly memorable soundtrack—a musical journey reflective of Luminous Plume's, yet ever worth partaking in even on its own.
